CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Talen Energy is a leading independent power producer and energy infrastructure company dedicated to powering the future. Talen has 10.7 GW of generation assets, with 2.2 GW of nuclear power and a significant dispatchable fossil fleet. Talen is committed to generating power safely and reliably, delivering the most value per megawatt produced and driving the energy transition. Talen is also powering the digital infrastructure revolution. Talen is well-positioned to capture this significant growth opportunity, as data centers serving artificial intelligence increasingly demand more reliable, clean power.
